questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the Azure AI Anomaly Detector service?
options: To monitor and detect anomalies in time-series data
questions.answer: To monitor and detect anomalies in time-series data

questions.question: Azure AI Anomaly Detector requires extensive machine learning expertise to use.
List two use cases for the Azure AI Anomaly Detector service.
Which algorithm is used by the Azure AI Anomaly Detector for multivariate anomaly detection?
Batch detection in Azure AI Anomaly Detector processes real-time data to detect anomalies.
